articles.content: In a piece he wrote in 1983 about the Israeli invasion of Lebanon, he claimed that Our hearts bled for the Lebanese and Palestinian men, women and children, and we all started hating the Israelis, ju… [+2144 chars]

articles.author: Lizzie Smith
articles.title: I'm A Celeb's Vernon Kay struggles to eat after stomach shrank from 2.5-stone weight loss - Mirror Online
articles.description: After living on a diet of rice and beans for three weeks in the I'm A Celebrity castle, Vernon Kay was hoping to pile the weight back on when he returned home to wife Tess Daly.
articles.content:
Vernon Kay is struggling to eat after his stomach shrank while he was in the I'm A Celebrity castle.
The TV star lost a whopping two-and-a-half stone in just three weeks while competing on the hit I… [+2649 chars]
